Questions.QuestionString: 21. How many cargo fire extinghuising bottle on A350- 1000 aircraft
Answers: A. Three: One is Hight Rated (bottle 1) and two are Flow Metered (bottle 2 and 3)
B. Three: Two are Hight Rated (bottles 1 and 2) and one is Flow Metered (bottle 3)
C. Three: One is Hight Rated (bottle 1) and one is Flow Metered (bottle 2)
